thread.section_title: Fine Rug Collection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Rug Collection | finerugcollection.com
thread.title: ann
thread.title_full: Fine Rug Collection reviewed by ann

author: ann
title: ann
text: I was leery about buying a good rug on line. I am so pleased that I did. The rug is beautiful, colors as depicted, particularly with the video. The rug came quickly, is of excellent quality, and looks beautiful. The rug was folded in half for shipping. I was concerned that we would have fold marks in the rug, but we did not. We had a minor issue with the rug pad, but I called and it was handled immediately. I will use this company again, and highly recommend them.
